column2: "Na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ esuafo no so dɛ
column3: Ɔhonyanyi bi wɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ ofihwɛfo bi
column4: na wɔkɔtoaa no maa no dɛ ɔresɛɛ n’adze."

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ no see no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze nye yi a metse no wɔ wo ho yi? Bobu wo fihwɛ adwuma ho akontaa
column4: na innyi ho kwan dɛ idzi fihwɛfo bio."

column2: "Na ofihwɛfo no kae wɔ no mu dɛ
column3: Mebɛyɛ dɛn? Mo wura rebɛgye edwuma no wɔ me nsamu. Minnyi ahoɔdzen dɛ mubotutu; na ehua so yɛ me fɛr."

column2: "Ɛhɛɛ
column3: mehu dza mebɛyɛ
column4: ama woyi me ofihwɛ edwuma do a
column5: wɔaagye me akɔ hɔn efiefi mu."

column2: "Nna ɔfrɛɛ no wura n’akafo nyina baa ne nkyɛn
column3: na obisaa nyia odzi kan no dɛ
column4: Edze mo wura kaw ahen?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ngo etwadze ɔha. Na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Fa wo nwoma na tsena ase ntsɛm kyerɛw eduonum."

column2: "Nna obisaa baako so dɛ
column3: Wo so edze ahen? Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ewifua etwadze ɔha. Ɔsee no dɛ
column5: Fa wo nwoma na kyerɛw eduowɔtwe."

column2: "Na owura no kamfoo ofihwɛfo onyitseweefo no dɛ ɔayɛ no nyansa mu: iyi mpo kyerɛ dɛ wiadze yi mba nye hɔnankasa hɔn santsen dzi no nyansa mu kyɛn kan mba."
"Na mese hom dɛ
column3: Hom mfa wiadze ahonyadze      a ɔnntsen no bi do nya anyɛnkofo; na sɛ ofi hom nsa a
column4: wɔaagye hom akɔ onnyiewiei ntamadan no mu."

column2: "Nyia odzi nokwar wɔ adze ketseaba mu no
column3: odzi nokwar wɔ pii mu; na nyia ɔnntsen wɔ adze ketseaba mu no
column4: ɔnntsen wɔ pii so mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom enndzi nokwar wɔ wiadze ahonyadze a ɔnntsen no mu a
column3: woana dze dza ɔyɛ tsenenee no bɛhyɛ hom nsa?"

column2: "Na sɛ hom enndzi nokwar wɔ obi dze mu a
column3: woana dze homankasa homdze bɛma hom?"

column2: "Akowaa biara nntum nnsom wuranom beenu: na obekyir kor no na ɔadɔ kor no
column3: anaadɛ obosuo kor no mu na oebu kor no enyimtsia. Hom runntum nnsom Nyankopɔn nye wiadze ahonyadze."

column2: "Na Farisiifo no a wɔyɛ sikapɛfo tsee yinom nyina no
column3: wosii no atwetwe."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nye hɔn a wobu hɔnho bem wɔ nyimpa enyim
column4: na Nyankopɔn dze onyim hom akoma mu
column5: na dza wohuhor no wɔ nyimpa mu no yɛ ekyiwadze wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo no bɛpeem John do; na ofitsi ɔno do no
column3: wɔka Nyankopɔn ahenman ho no asɛmpa
column4: na obiara dze enyiber kɔ mu."

column2: "Na ɔyɛ mberɛw dɛ sor nye asaase botwa mu sen dɛ mbra no ne nsensanee kor mpo befi mu."
"Obiara a obegyaa ne yer na ɔawar fofor no
column3: ɔto awar; na obiara a ɔbɔwar nyia no kun egyaa no no
column4: ɔto awar."

column2: "Nna osikanyi bi wɔ hɔ a ɔhyɛ aboɔdzen ntar a ɔyɛ fɛw
column3: na ɔtsenaa enyigye nye afɛɛfɛdze mu daa."

column2: "Na ohianyi bi so wɔ hɔ a ne dzin dze Lazarus a wɔdze no bɔtoo n’abowano a oetutu ekur
column4: "na no kɔn dɔɔ dɛ odzi dza ofi osikanyi no no pon do gu famu mee; naaso mbɔdɔm bae bɛtafeer n’ekur mu mpo."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ohianyi no wui
column3: na abɔfo bɔsoaa no kɔr Abraham no bo mu; na osikanyi no so wui na wosiee no."

column2: "Na samanadze na osikanyi no maa n’enyi do
column3: nna ɔwɔ ahoguan kɛse mu
column4: na ohun Abraham wɔ ekyirekyir
column5: na Lazarus twer no bo mu."

column2: "Na ɔtseaa mu see dɛ
column3: Egya Abraham
column4: hu me mbɔbɔr
column5: na soma Lazarus ma ɔmfa ne nsatseaba ano mbɔ nsu mu
column6: na ɔmfa mbɔdwedwe me tɛkyerɛma: na mo ho ruguan me wɔ gyaframee yi mu."

column2: "Na Abraham see dɛ
column3: Ɔba
column4: kaa dɛ wo nkwaber mu inyaa wo ndzepa
column5: dɛmara na Lazarus so nyaa ne ndzebɔn; na afei no werɛ akyekyer

column2: "Na yinom nyina ekyir no
column3: ɔka kɛse da yɛnye hom ntamu
column4: ma hɔn a wɔpɛ dɛ wofi ha tra ba hom nkyɛn nntum
column5: na eso wonntum mmfi noho nntra mmba hɛn nkyɛn."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Dɛm dze a
column4: egya
column9: ma ɔnkɛkyerɛ hɔn mbrɛ ndzɛmba tse amma hɔn so wɔaammba amandzehubea yi mu bi."

column2: "Na Abraham see dɛ
column3: Wɔwɔ Moses nye nkɔnhyɛfo no wɔ hɔ: ma wontsie hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Oho
column4: egya Abraham
column5: na sɛ obi fi ewufo mu kɔ hɔn nkyɛn a

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Sɛ woenntsie Moses nye nkɔnhyɛfo no a
column4: obi fi ewufo mu soɛr mpo a
